summary: MAJOR: Jesse Pollak published significant strategy update (15h ago, cross-pollinating through ecosystem), acknowledging Base App creator focus was 'too far ahead' and pivoting back to traders/builders. This signals major Base strategic realignment.

Full Base mission/vision/strategy to be shared next week
Decentralizing leadership and giving platform+distribution+capital to ecosystem builders
